settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code.
Contact [Shopify Booster Support](https://shopifybooster.clickfunnels.com/support) for any kind of help.
Use class="color" on a an input tag to bring up the color picker. Only a few colors have been included here as an example.

settings.label: Primary
settings.info: Used for text links, and primary buttons

settings.label: Dropdown Color Hover
settings.info: Mega Menu & Sub Menu Hover, Focus Color

settings.label: Custom logo
settings.info: Maximum logo dimensions are 450px wide by 200px high. The uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: Max logo width
settings.info: Defined in pixels. Do not add the 'px' unit.

settings.label: Navigation Menu Font Size
settings.info: Defined in pixels. Do not add the 'px' unit.

settings.label: Navigation Mega Menu Font Size
settings.info: Defined in pixels. Do not add the 'px' unit.

settings.label: Mobile logo
settings.info: This logo will only appear on the mobile version of your store. Maximum logo dimensions are 360px wide by 100px high. The uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: Hide the Right Section on Mobile
Disable the free item ($0) in search page
Parent Name of Dropdown Menu
settings.info: Menu name only use lowercase eg: For 'Summer Sale' use menu name eg: 'summer sale'. The name you'll put here need to be the same as the one you want to replace. It will replace the current element of the standard navigation link for the Mega Menu.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Pop Up is Showing After
settings.info: The Discount Pop Up will Show up only If the customer Didn't Added to cart anything on your Store After X Minutes

settings.label: Enable Upsell Pop Up
settings.info: Enable upsell pop up then upsell pop up work on select quantity 1 and click on addto cart button

settings.label: Disable Upsell Pop Up by Using Tag
settings.info: Disable the Upsell from Certain Product by Using Product Tag: no-upsell

settings.content: Default UpSell Popup (When a upsell Popup don't match any collection.)
if you want to particular collection set of 'free product' following setting manage to you different 7 type of collections

settings.label: Slide Show Speed
settings.info: Setting speed is in milliseconds Ex: 2000

settings.content: This setting is only working with style 5 in the home page product setting

settings.info: Style 5 (collection row): This style is working with the home page - collection row setting
settings.label: Product Disposition Style
For Text Limit On Mobile Product Title
Home page text limit
settings.info: Number of character in your Title. Ex : 35

settings.label: Category page text limit
settings.info: Number of character in your Title. Ex : 35

settings.label: Enable Default Variant Picture and Price
Product Title Size
settings.info: Put Only the Numeric Value. Ex : 20 (= 20 Pixels)

settings.label: Disable sale button on home page
Product image Size Setting for all Mobile and desktop
Add To Cart:Hover
settings.info: add To Cart Button Color hover

settings.label: FREE + SHIP Button
settings.info: FREE + SHIP Add To Cart Button Color

settings.label: FREE + SHIP Button:Hover
settings.info: FREE + SHIP Add To Cart Button Color hover

settings.label: FREE + SHIP Button of text color
Add To Cart Text for 0$ item
settings.info: Add To Cart Button text for 0$ Item

settings.label: Skip Cart
settings.info: Skip Cart And go Directly to Checkout

settings.label: Allow to move product title before
Allow to move product description after

settings.content: change the order of the Product page element

settings.label: Choose between color swatch or drop down menu for the variant
Select background color for selected swatch
Select font color for selected swatch
Show shared count
settings.info: Only available for Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest

settings.label: Timer disable using product tag
settings.info: disable the timer from certain product by using product tag: no-timer

TIMER-2: Randomly pick an hour from 15 minutes to 24hours , and a random number left in stock from 3 to 12. TIMER-3: custom time with cookies based time. product page refresh after timer not change continuous time countdown. TIMER-4: So you can set that at (22:00:00) it reset every day

options.label: TIMER-1: Custom Timer (You can set up the time you want to show up)
TIMER-2: Random Timer (Choose randomly a time to show up)
TIMER-3: Enable timer (custom minutes and custom left number or inventory based left number) with cookies based**
TIMER-4: Enable timer reset every day(custom left number)***

settings.label: Timer Setting Option

options.label: Enable common cookies time for all product
Enable different cookies time for all product

settings.label: TIMER-3:cookies based timer of continue decreasing or different decrease

options.label: Show up the real time inventory left number of the store (every time there’s a REAL sale, the number decrease.)
Cookie Based Show up the real time inventory left number of the store ( Start decreasing from the real number in stock )

settings.label: TIMER-3:for enable cookies based timer of  left number
Enable timer  for custom seconds
settings.info: Note*:max second limit 359999 after more put second timer not work properly.  Example: 1500 second left = 25 minutes left

settings.label: Top Message LEFT Number
settings.info: Use number Example:1  ,where you want the product left qty to appear

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)

settings.label: Left image
settings.info: Maximum logo dimensions are 500px wide by 100px high. The uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: Right image
settings.info: Maximum logo dimensions are 500px wide by 100px high. The uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.
